name: Premiere Power Cleaning
description:
Premiere Power Cleaning

Our soft wash technique keeps water from being forced behind the siding which can lead to serious damage in the future.The soft wash method is safe (and efficient) for cleaning stucco and bricks.Think of the pressure being as soft as your shower. We never use high pressure water on the roof, but our softwash process makes it look new again.The black streaks are gone the same day and the moss and lichens are killed in the process.Moss on your roof can cut the lifespan of your roof forcing you to replace it sooner than you have to.
